pullRequest.title: Make price providers cmdline param more readable
pullRequest.bodyText:
We have a line in bisq-desktop --help saying:
  --providers=<host:port[,...]>
        List custom providers

Like so, it is not clear what providers you can set using that config option.
This PR only adds "price" to List custom /price/ providers.
Stumbled upon this during network size metric testing.

commit.message: Make price providers cmdline param more readable

nodes.bodyText:
I've always wanted to rename this option. Improving the description is a fine start.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                            parser.accepts(PROVIDERS, "List custom price providers")
          
          
            
                            parser.accepts(PROVIDERS, "List custom pricenodes")

commit.message:
Apply suggestions from code review

Co-Authored-By: Chris Beams <chris@beams.io>
